articles.title: DC Comics removing ‘the American way’ from Superman slogan: report - Fox Business
articles.description: For decades, the iconic comic-book character Superman has stood for “truth, justice and the American way.” But apparently those days are over.
articles.content:

articles.author: RT
articles.title: International Space Station accidentally rotates 57 degrees mid-orbit while hosting director & actress filming milestone movie - RT
articles.description: An error by Russian cosmonauts on the International Space Station during engine testing accidentally rotated the satellite 57 degrees, causing American astronauts on board to sound a distress signal, it was revealed on Friday.
articles.content: The ISS is currently hosting director Klim Shipenko and actress Yulia Peresild, who have made a short trip to the satellite to create 'The Challenge,' the first feature film to be recorded in space. … [+1200 chars]
